ygData.subject: Re: Magical Eye of Disvan **possible spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: So when You equip, it doesn t change any of your stats or resistances? My guess is it s a quest item then. If you don t mind me asking, what did you kill to
ygData.messageBody:
So when You equip, it doesn't change any of your stats or resistances?
My guess is it's a quest item then. If you don't mind me asking, what
did you kill to get it? Ask around that area (near Troll town?) to see
if anyone is looking for it.

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
*Live from Ground Zero*

David Platt wrote:
>
> From: David Platt <davidp@...>
>
> Greetings all,
>
> While hunting Rathe Lake I stumbled upon an odd find. It is a magical item
> called the "Eye of Disvan". I have performed many tests on the item and as
> of yet it's magical properties elude me.
> It is translucent to look upon and round, much like a crystal ball.
> Have any of ye gatherers of knowledge out there heard about such an item?
> Any help in solving the mystery of this Lore Item would be greatly
> appreciated.
>
> My thanks,
>
> Mirrin of the Nife.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
